compliant.section: 法定代理人或監護人得隨時請求本公司停止特定帳號及其相關之個人資料之蒐集、處理及利用行為。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing

compliant.section: 若您不同意該等變更或修改，請停止繼續使用本網站服務，並依本隱私權政策規定通知本公司停止蒐集、處理及利用您的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent at any time, Right to object

non_compliant.section: 本網站並非特別為成年人/兒童設計
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly state the age of consent for data processing and provide mechanisms for obtaining parental consent for children under that age.

non_compliant.section: 本隱私權政策將因應需求隨時進行修改，如有修改，本網站將修正後的條款將刊登於網站上，不另作個別通知。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: GDPR requires explicit consent for any material changes to the privacy policy. Simply posting changes on the website is not sufficient. Users should be actively informed and their consent obtained.

non_compliant.section: 若會員委託他人代為登入者，會員將負完全的責任。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (Integrity and confidentiality)
non_compliant.amend: While holding users responsible is important, the policy should also emphasize the website's own responsibility in ensuring data security and implementing appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data.
